name: Quintessentila Duels
description:
In a world where only the strong survive you must carve your destiny from your foes. Can you defeat all of your opponents to become the champion? Duel others like you in search of the rare cards and strengthen your deck. The object of a duel is to capture as many cards on the battlefield as possible. You capture cards by playing cards with greater power than adjacent cards. Beware of the special plus and same rules!

Quintessential Duels is a free-to-play collectible card game. You play against 32 AI opponents to win new cards and grow your collection. Can you collect them all?

Quintessential Duels is 100% free to play. I wouldn't object if you were to donate toward funding my caffeine addiction.
